name: Mission Mars (itch) (Rajcsányi László (WLS)) (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy. Original version: John P. Shay - Solar Software Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Original Story:

You have been sent on a mission to raid the caverns on Mars. However these caverns are known to be filled with booby traps. Your task is to reach the centre of the caverns and land your ship. Each cavern has 5 stages to survive and you will need a lot of skill to do so. You can control your ship LEFT, RIGHT, FAST and SLOW, you can also drop bombs.

 Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor LEFT and RIGHT
Acceleration: Cursor DOWN
Deceleration: Cursor UP
Fire: Z or X or Alt or CTRL   

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow LEFT and RIGHT
Acceleration: Arrow DOWN
Deceleration: Arrow UP
Fire: A or B   

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Mission_Mars
